issue.title: sdf::Vector3 operator == comparison tolerance too large?

content.raw: I just happened to look at this issue, and noticed that it doesn't apply to sdformat anymore, and should be transferred over to ign-math.  Apparently you have to be administrator to do that: https://confluence.atlassian.com/bitbucket/export-or-import-issue-data-330797432.html .   @nkoenig do you mind?
content.html: I just happened to look at this issue, and noticed that it doesn't apply to sdformat anymore, and should be transferred over to ign-math. Apparently you have to be administrator to do that: https://confluence.atlassian.com/bitbucket/export-or-import-issue-data-330797432.html . @nkoenig do you mind?
